bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
For some reason, I'm getting this during tests: <denchmark-code>[INFO] datavec-spark-inference-server ..................... FAILURE [ 7.735 s] [INFO] datavec-spark-inference-client ..................... FAILURE [ 6.044 s] </denchmark-code>
Due to java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: akka.cluster.ClusterActorRefProvider

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
